items.sentence: Your children have sure grown a lot since the last time I saw them.
Tom rushed over to Mary's house when he heard that she needed help.
I have to take care of my little brother until my parents get home.
Efforts to bring the blaze under control using buckets soon failed.
It's important for the students to know what to expect on the exam.
They want to increase food production by growing new kinds of rice.
I did everything I could to help Tom, and this is how he repays me.
Could the two of you share one umbrella and leave the other for me?
I've gathered plenty of resources to help my students learn French.
I'd think the last thing you'd want to do right now is talk to Tom.
